info.name: Blue YouTube by TheLegendOfWolf#3683
info.additionalInfo:
Note: If you wanna to use this theme, turn on dark theme on youtube.
Note2: Found a bug? Report it to me on Discord! TheLegendOfWolf#3683
Note3: I am not great coder, but this is my first time, when i release bigger style.

v1.2: Small change for comments section.
v1.2.1: Fixed "Post" button.
v1.3: Added style for sponsoring, and add more style to live streaming
v2.0: added style for voice searching, and more!
v3.0: Fixed all bugs. Added logo color, fixed dot in sidebar color, added color to video settings ;D
